experience.title: Investment Analyst (buy-side)
experience.description: 1. Portfolio Management - BFSI• Managed Aviva Insurance’s $110mn investment portfolio of 6 UK-based banks impacted after Brexit• Assisted banks in new customer acquisition & improving asset quality to improve sales & profitability• Built robust financial model to perform DCF & relative valuation of portfolio under alternate scenarios• Evaluated exit strategy (time to exit & exit multiple) for distressed banks portfolio to maximize returns• Improved efficiency by 75% by building a dashboard to track financial performance across 20+ KPIs2. Portfolio Management (American Express, SNBC and Santander Bank)• Analyzed performance of $400mn investment portfolios of American Express, SNBC & Santander bank• Evaluated risk on portfolio’s valuation by conducting sensitivity analysis on discount rate3. Market Outlook• Analysed economy & housing markets in European countries to conduct analysis of RMBS asset class
